blogPost.title: Before the "great ﬁrewall" began blocking Clubhouse, people in China were paying up to $78 to buy an invitation code for access https://t.co/YGuRtF9Pgx
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 在 "长城 "开始封堵Clubhouse之前，中国的人们花了高达78美元的价格购买了一个访问邀请码，https://t.co/YGuRtF9Pgx。
在 "長城 "開始封堵Clubhouse之前，中國的人們花了高達78美元的價格購買了一個訪問邀請碼，https://t.co/YGuRtF9Pgx。

previous.title: “As a young scientist I was terrified of what people might think about me...Now I don’t give a damn. I just want to find the truth with whatever I look at.” Read @1843mag's profile of Avi Loeb https://t.co/qdVV0AK4My

localize.full_text: "作为一个年轻的科学家，我很害怕人们对我的看法......现在我不在乎。我只想用我所看的任何东西找到真相。" 阅读@1843mag对Avi Loeb的介绍https://t.co/qdVV0AK4My。
"作爲一個年輕的科學家，我很害怕人們對我的看法......現在我不在乎。我只想用我所看的任何東西找到真相。" 閱讀@1843mag對Avi Loeb的介紹https://t.co/qdVV0AK4My。

next.title: In the struggle between democracy and dictatorship, it is crucial that democracies tell the truth in plain language. China is committing crimes against humanity in Xinjiang. That is different from genocide https://t.co/o4vf4jw5cO

localize.full_text: 在民主与独裁之间的斗争中，民主国家必须以通俗的语言说出真相。中国在新疆犯下了反人类罪。这与灭绝种族罪不同，https://t.co/o4vf4jw5cO
在民主與獨裁之間的鬥爭中，民主國家必須以通俗的語言說出真相。中國在新疆犯下了反人類罪。這與滅絕種族罪不同，https://t.co/o4vf4jw5cO
